text: I think I under-appreciate this channel. Thereâ€™s some good music in here, yall have fine taste.

What <@U7SL518D6> says! I do have a serious comlaint though; there was a silence of a full month. I find it totally unacceptable that hard working people like us should be left with only the terrible sound of our neighbours whistling some crooked, deformed version of what they believe Beethoven should sound like. We should be glad the poor bastard died deaf, or he would be rolling over in his grave like tumbleweed
So let me drop some more tunes. May the sound be with you!
